T02D2539:132b-27: zhabs mthil gyis ni mnan nas ni //

T02D2539:133b-0: dngos grub thob kyis zer nas de ltar @133b byas

T02D2539:133b-31: de bzhin nyid de glo bur gyi dri ma dang

T02D2539:134b-23: par nga'i gam du sdom pa 'dzin nus sam byas

T02D2539:136a-7: rnams ni khyed blta bar 'dod pas /

T02D2539:136a-9: dge slong rnams kyis gdams ngag zhus pas /
T02D2539:136a-10: rje btsun gyis yongs su mi skyo ba'i chos bcu bshad /
T02D2539:136a-11: sangs rgyas mchod pa la mi skyo ba dang /
T02D2539:136a-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2539:136a-16: thos pa gcig nas gcig tu bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing spyod ba dang /
T02D2539:136a-19: sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sogs pa bsgrub ba la
T02D2539:136a-20: mi skyo ba dang bcu bshad nas dge slong rnams
T02D2539:136a-21: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod nas /
T02D2539:136a-22: der skyid pa'i 'byung gnas grong khyer na nags tshal
T02D2539:136a-23: chen po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par mdo sde chos
T02D2539:136a-24: kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya
T02D2539:136a-25: ba / mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu thun mong du bshad /
T02D2539:136a-26: dus de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i klu rnams kyis chos mnyan pa dang lha dang mi'i lus thob po //
T02D2539:136a-27: dus de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang theg pa gsum gyis 'dul bar snang ngo //
T02D2539:136a-28: dus de'i tshe skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi thams
T02D2539:136a-29: cad dang tshong dpon nor bu bzang po la sogs
T02D2539:136a-30: pas rje btsun la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas
T02D2539:136a-31: 'khod pa las / de la khyad par du tshong
T02D2539:136a-32: dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gzigs nas rje btsun
T02D2539:136a-33: gyis gnyis med kyi ye shes bstan no //
T02D2539:136a-34: de lta bu'i rje btsun de rang gi yon tan
T02D2539:136a-35: ci dang ldan na yon tan shes pas chos shes
T02D2539:136a-36: bkra shis pa'o // bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad 'byung ba'o //
T02D2539:136a-37: bkra shis kun gyi nang na rje btsun bkra shis so //
T02D2539:136a-38: grags pa nas skyabs su 'os zhes pa ni /
T02D2539:136a-39: sngon rje btsun rgyal bu thams cad sgrol zhes bya
T02D2539:136a-40: bar gyur pa'i dus su chu bo chen po'i 'gram
T02D2539:136a-41: na bzhugs pa la srog chags mang po ma thar
T02D2539:136b-1: rje btsun chu 'gram na 'dug pas rgyal bu de
T02D2539:136b-2: rang 'dra ba du mar sprul nas gcig la gcig
T02D2539:136b-3: 'jus nas zam pa byas nas kun bton te dbugs
T02D2539:136b-4: phyung ngo // der de na yod pa kun gyis lan ldon pa la /
T02D2539:136b-5: rje btsun gyis nga la lan glan mi dgos kyi
T02D2539:136b-6: nga'i gdams ngag 'di zung shig gsungs nas chos kyi
T02D2539:136b-7: ston mo mdzad pa'i chos gcig ni byang chub kyi
T02D2539:136b-9: gnyis pa ni thos pas mi ngoms pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-11: gsum pa ni sdig pa spong ba dang /
T02D2539:136b-12: dge ba la brtson pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-14: bzhi pa ni tshul khrims dag pa /
T02D2539:136b-18: lnga pa ni byang chub la zhugs pa /
T02D2539:136b-23: drug pa ni slob dpon bsten pa /
T02D2539:136b-24: sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba /
T02D2539:136b-28: sems can la snying rje che ba'o //
T02D2539:136b-29: bdun pa ni zhi gnas tshol ba /
T02D2539:136b-36: brgyad pa ni las su rung ba /
T02D2539:136b-39: sdig pa skyes pa spong ba /
T02D2539:136b-40: ma skyes pa mi bskyed pa /
T02D2539:136b-41: dge ba skyes pa spel pa /
T02D2539:136b-43: dgu pa ni dus gsum la rtog pa gsum /
T02D2539:136b-44: mtshan ma med pa rtog / dus la ma zhen /
T02D2539:136b-48: bsam pa bzhin du byed pa'o //
T02D2539:136b-49: bcu pa ni bdag med pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-52: mi rtag par yid ches pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-53: skye ba la dug tu 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-54: phung po rnams la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-55: khams la sbrul gdug par 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-56: skye mched la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-57: srid pa rnams la chu zlar 'du shes pa dang /
T02D2539:136b-58: mya ngan las 'das pa la skam sar 'du shes pa dang bcu gsungs pa'o //
T02D2539:136b-59: de lta bu'i rje btsun de bkur sti la sogs
T02D2539:136b-60: pa'i gnas su gyur pa nas skyabs su 'os zhes
T02D2539:137a-1: 'jig rten gyi dgra sel bas na'o //
T02D2539:137a-2: 'di yang rje btsun gyis sngon seng ge dang glang
T02D2539:137a-3: po che dang me dang sbrul dang rkun mo dang
T02D2539:137a-4: rgyal po dang nye bar 'tshe ba re re bzlog
T02D2539:137a-5: pa phan yon gyi skabs su 'byung ngo //
T02D2539:137a-6: ji ltar bstan na 'jigs pa sel zhe na /
T02D2539:137a-7: sku cir yang ston te gtsug phud ces pa nas /
T02D2539:137a-8: bram ze tshangs pa shes pa ni phyi rol mu
T02D2539:137a-9: stegs nas bzung nas dri za dang rab tu byung
T02D2539:137a-10: ba dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
T02D2539:137a-11: bram ze dang rig byed dang /
T02D2539:137a-12: lha tshangs pa'i smrang 'don pa la sogs ba nas
T02D2539:137a-13: thams cad mkhyen ba nas tshangs pa thob ces bya
T02D2539:137a-14: ba'o // de'i ngo bo gang zhe na /
T02D2539:137a-16: chags bral ma lus 'dul ba po //
T02D2539:137a-18: nyan thos kyi mya ngan las 'das pa las mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2539:137a-19: bde sdug ni rtog pa kun dang bral nas chags bral gzugs khams kyi lus las 'das pa'o ;
T02D2539:137a-20: / sku'i mtshan nyid dngos gang zhe na /
T02D2539:137a-23: thub pa med cing nas sad pa'i bdag ces pas ston te /
T02D2539:137a-24: chos sku de rtog pas mi thub pa la 'di yin pa dpe med /
T02D2539:137a-25: mi rtog pa la mi mngon gsal ba'i rkyen med pas so //
T02D2539:137a-26: skyon med pas mi 'gyur kun la khyab par gnas rtogs par dka' ba'i dri mas ma gos pa /
T02D2539:137a-27: nyes pa rdul tsam yang med pas nyan thos rang
T02D2539:137a-28: rgyal byang chub sems dpa' las shin tu sad pas
T02D2539:137a-31: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun shes nas //
T02D2539:137a-32: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pas bstan te /
T02D2539:137a-33: kun shes la sogs pa ji snyed dang ji lta
T02D2539:137a-34: ba shes pas gzung 'dzin las 'das pa gnyis su
T02D2539:137a-35: med pas mi rtog pa lhun gyis grub pa'i dus
T02D2539:137a-36: gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi las yin pas de mdzad
T02D2539:137a-37: pa'o // de'i chos nyid de'i sems nyid sangs rgyas yin te /
T02D2539:137a-38: sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pas bstan te /
T02D2539:137a-39: rig pa byang chub sems 'di dang po bar dang
T02D2539:137a-40: tha ma btsal na ma rnyed pa nyid sna tshogs
T02D2539:137a-41: su snang / snang tsam nyid na stong pa las ma g-yos pas /
T02D2539:137a-42: chu zla lta bu de ni /
T02D2539:137a-43: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
T02D2539:137b-0: @137b ces pa lta bu'i ye shes mig gcig ni
T02D2539:137b-1: bsgom pa'i dus na dri med 'od gsal lta ba'i
T02D2539:137b-2: dus na rig pa 'dus ma byas 'phel 'grib dang
T02D2539:137b-3: bral ba snang stong dbyer med spyod pa'i dus na
T02D2539:137b-4: mnyam gzhag chen po'i spyod pa bya'o //
T02D2539:137b-6: de ltar rtogs pas ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2539:137b-7: des chos ji ltar gsungs she na /
T02D2539:137b-8: tshig gi nas tshugs pa med ces pas bstan te /
T02D2539:137b-9: rje btsun smra ba'i seng ge ste /
T02D2539:137b-10: 'di yang sngon rje btsun yul ma ga dh'a'i pho
T02D2539:137b-11: brang dgon pa snying po byang chub na bzhugs pa
T02D2539:137b-12: gdan seng ge'i khri padma'i steng na bzhugs nas /
T02D2539:137b-13: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brjod du
T02D2539:137b-14: med pa la nges pa don gyi chos ston te
T02D2539:137b-15: / kun la bag mi tsha bas na'o //
T02D2539:137b-16: de lta bu'i rje btsun de thugs rje phyogs med
T02D2539:137b-17: cing sku dang 'od zer khyad par du 'phags pas
T02D2539:137b-18: na kun nas blta na sdug ces bya'o //
T02D2539:137b-19: 'o na gang nas byung na thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas byung ba'o //
T02D2539:137b-21: zhes pa rje btsun gyi phyag la bya ste /
T02D2539:137b-22: sngon tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis chos zhus /
T02D2539:137b-23: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos lung bstan nas mthar
T02D2539:137b-24: byams pa dang 'jam dpal la man ngag zhus nas
T02D2539:137b-25: / grong khyer yid bde ba mngon du gyur pa
T02D2539:137b-26: na tshong dpon gyi bu yod pa la 'jam dpal
T02D2539:137b-27: gyis dpag tshad brgyad cu'i pha rol nas phyag gser
T02D2539:137b-28: gyi mdog can brkyang nas nor bzangs kyi spyi bor
T02D2539:137b-29: / bzhag nas / de las 'od zer 'phros pas
T02D2539:137b-30: 'gro ba kun bde ba la bkod de gdams ngag
T02D2539:137b-31: / bzhag nas / byas so // sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste //
T02D2539:137b-32: zhes pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med //
T02D2539:137b-33: ces pas rje btsun sems can kun gyi nad 'byin pa ste /
T02D2539:137b-34: sngon grong khyer yangs pa can na nad skya rbab
T02D2539:137b-35: bya ba byung nas kun 'chi ba la thug nas
T02D2539:137b-36: / sman pa gang gis kyang phan ma thogs nas
T02D2539:137b-37: rje btsun gyis blon po sman pa bya bar sprul
T02D2539:137b-38: nas nad kun zhi bar byas so //
T02D2539:137b-39: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
T02D2539:137b-40: nad do cog gi dgra che ba //
T02D2539:137b-41: zhes pa ni sngon nad kyi bskal pa byung ba'i dus sems can thams cad kha btag pa las /
T02D2539:138a-0: rje btsun gyis nya ro hi tar sprul @138a * //
T02D2539:138a-1: nas de'i sha su bros pa nad las thar te /
T02D2539:138a-2: don nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad kyi gnyen po
T02D2539:138a-3: rje btsun sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mchog go
T02D2539:138a-4: // dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
T02D2539:138a-5: zhes pa ni sngon lha dbang phyug chen po 'dul
T02D2539:138a-6: ba'i dus su kho'i 'khor dang nyi 'khor thams cad
T02D2539:138a-7: bran du bcad chos skyong srung mar dam phog pa
T02D2539:138a-8: las / gza' chen po brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad gros byas te /
T02D2539:138a-9: gza' khyab 'jug byung nas 'o cag bka' nyan pa 'di mi bya byas pas /
T02D2539:138a-10: 'o cag yo h'um mdzad la bsngo zer ba la /
T02D2539:138a-11: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni bud med yin
T02D2539:138a-12: pas nged kyis cang thub bam zer ba la gza'
T02D2539:138a-13: chen po brgyad ma nyan nas der nam mkha' nas
T02D2539:138a-14: thog dang ser ba phab bas /
T02D2539:138a-15: rje btsun gyis gza' dang rgyu skar gyi steng du
T02D2539:138a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na rdo rje 'jigs byed bzhugs
T02D2539:138a-17: pa de la gza' brgyad kyis bskor ba /
T02D2539:138a-18: khyams la rgyu skar bdun bdun gyis bskor ba lta
T02D2539:138a-19: bas chog mi shes pa de lta bu cig de
T02D2539:138a-20: tsho'i steng du bsgoms nas thog ser btang ba bred
T02D2539:138a-21: de srog gi snying po phul dam bcas dkyil 'khor
T02D2539:138a-23: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can //
T02D2539:138a-25: der ma zad phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa //
T02D2539:138a-26: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs //
T02D2539:138a-27: zhes pa ni sngon grong khyer chen po spang ri
T02D2539:138a-28: zhes pa na rje btsun 'jam dpal byang chub sems
T02D2539:138a-29: dpa'i 'khor stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa la theg
T02D2539:138a-30: pa chen po'i chos thams cad ston pa'i dus su
T02D2539:138a-31: / zhabs kyi mthil nas 'od zer 'phros nas dmyal ba rnams la chos 'chad /
T02D2539:138a-32: de bzhin du pus mo nas yi dvags /
T02D2539:138a-33: lte ba nas byo la song /
T02D2539:138a-34: rtsi ba logs nas gshin rje /
T02D2539:138a-36: smin phrag nas lha ma yin /
T02D2539:138a-38: zhal nas rang rgyal smin mtshams nas byang sems la ;
T02D2539:138a-39: spyi gtsug nas sangs rgyas la chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs so //
T02D2539:138a-40: la la dag sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang du sbyor ro //
T02D2539:138a-41: chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs pa ni rje
T02D2539:138a-42: btsun gyi zhabs las byang chub sems dpa' snang ba
T02D2539:138b-0: mdzod kyi snying po sprul @138b nas 'og gi phyogs
T02D2539:138b-1: su chos ston / byin pa las byang chub sems
T02D2539:138b-2: dpa' gsang ba'i mdzod du sprul nas shar gyi phyogs
T02D2539:138b-3: su chos ston / su chos ston / pus mo
T02D2539:138b-4: las byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi mdzod du sprul
T02D2539:138b-5: su chos ston / su chos ston / nas ston
T02D2539:138b-6: / sta zur las byang chub sems dpa' sprin sgra
T02D2539:138b-7: su chos ston / su chos ston / nas ston
T02D2539:138b-8: / zab mo'i mdzod / lte ba las byang chub
T02D2539:138b-9: sems dpa' rdo rje mi phyed pa'i gtsug gi mdzod
T02D2539:138b-10: su chos ston / su chos ston / nas ston
T02D2539:138b-11: / zab mo'i mdzod / / thugs ka nas byang
T02D2539:138b-12: chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chos kyi mdzod /
T02D2539:138b-13: phrag pa las byang sems grags pa 'od kyi mdzod /
T02D2539:138b-14: zhal nas byang sems ri rab g-yo ba'i mdzod /
T02D2539:138b-15: smin mtshams nas byang sems kun du lta ba gzi brjid mdzod /
T02D2539:138b-16: dbu las byang chub sems dpa' thub pa med pa'i mdzod /
T02D2539:138b-17: steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su ston to //
T02D2539:138b-18: des 'gro ba drug la nyi ma bzhin du phyogs
T02D2539:138b-19: ris med pas na 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa
T02D2539:138b-20: ste / byams dang snying rja'i dkyil 'khor can tshad med bas gang ba'o //
T02D2539:138b-21: zhi bas mi 'dul na padma gar gyi dbang phyug
T02D2539:138b-22: tu 'gro ba 'dul ba kun la gzugs zhal stong
T02D2539:138b-23: phyag stong spyan stong du sprul nas don mdzad pas
T02D2539:138b-24: padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D2539:138b-25: rin chen dgos 'dod skong ba nyi ma bzhin du
T02D2539:138b-26: snyoms pas na khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs
T02D2539:138b-27: so // sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid che ste sprul pa spro ba'o //
T02D2539:138b-28: sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba ni gnyis med ye shes la kun skyes pas so //
T02D2539:138b-29: rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2539:138b-30: kun gyi bstan pa gcig ni yul gcig pa'o //
T02D2539:138b-31: rdo rje rigs nas thugs brtse ba ni rje btsun
T02D2539:138b-32: de yab lnga yum lnga'i rang bzhin du bstan no
T02D2539:138b-33: // rje btsun don dam par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kho na'o //
T02D2539:138b-34: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi sku bas lhag pas na sku che ba'o //
T02D2539:138b-35: kun gyi smra ba rnams kyi seng ger gyur pas na gsung yang dag pa yin no //
T02D2539:138b-36: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni dper na
T02D2539:138b-37: nyi ma 'char ba ri mtho mtho nas rim pas
T02D2539:138b-38: 'char yang nyi ma la mtho dman med do //
T02D2539:138b-39: de bzhin du rje btsun gyi thugs rje snang lugs
T02D2539:138b-40: kyi snod rim pa bzang ngan du snang yang rje
T02D2539:138b-41: btsun nyid la rtog pa med do //
T02D2539:139a-2: ces pa dper na zla ba la chos bzhi yod de /
T02D2539:139a-3: skar ma zil gyis gnon pa dang /
T02D2539:139a-5: chu dangs pa'i nang du 'char ba dang /
T02D2539:139a-6: kun la mngon sum du snang yang zla ba la rtog pa med do //
T02D2539:139a-7: de bzhin du rje btsun gyi sku zla ba lta bu ste /
T02D2539:139a-8: slob pa man chad zil gyis gnon pa dang /
T02D2539:139a-9: gdul bya la sku tshe ring thung gis ston pa dang /
T02D2539:139a-11: mos pa la gzugs brnyan snang ba dang /
T02D2539:139a-12: so sor mos pa byas nas bsgom pa'o //
T02D2539:139a-13: rje btsun la de'i rtog pa med do //
T02D2539:139a-14: chags bral la sogs chags pa che ni gdul bya
T02D2539:139a-15: thams cad bsdus na chags bral dang chags bcas de
T02D2539:139a-16: kho na nyid kyi gang zag go //
T02D2539:139a-17: rje btsun gyi sku kha dog sna tshogs spros pas chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa'o //
T02D2539:139a-18: rje btsun byang chub shing drung na bzhugs pa'i dus su 'od sna tshogs spro ba dang /
T02D2539:139a-19: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'gro ba ris drug la chos ston pa'o //
T02D2539:139a-20: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
T02D2539:139a-21: zhes pa ni sngon rgyal po'i pho brang rin chen
T02D2539:139a-22: sgron ma zhes bya ba na rgyal po dpal gyi
T02D2539:139a-23: gtsug phud bya bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
T02D2539:139a-24: padma'i sdong po las rdzus te byung ba mtshan dang
T02D2539:139a-25: dpe byad kyis brgyan pa de la btsun mo phrag
T02D2539:139a-27: blon po phrag bcu yod pa kun dang ldan pa dkar po'i chos la spyod pa sha stag go //
T02D2539:139a-28: dus de tsam na sems can gdul dka' ba de dag 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa las /
T02D2539:139a-29: dus der rje btsun gyis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi
T02D2539:139a-30: khyab pa'i sgo nas skad cig re re la sangs
T02D2539:139a-31: rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bsgrags pa
T02D2539:139a-32: zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi mdzod bshad do //
T02D2539:139a-33: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
T02D2539:139a-34: zhes pa tshong dpon gyi bus phyin tsam na khyad
T02D2539:139a-35: par du 'phags pa'i khang pa rim khang bcu'i dang
T02D2539:139a-36: po na bza' btung gis kun tshim par byed pa
T02D2539:139a-37: mthong / gnyis pa na gos sna tshogs kyis thams cad tshim par byed pa mthong /
T02D2539:139a-38: gsum pa na rgyan dang lhab lhub kyis /

T02D2539:142b-32: bzangs lha'i 'dun sar spyan drangs nas lha rnams kyi

T02D2539:142b-34: bzhud nas mthar sangs rgyas so //
T02D2539:142b-35: de la sras gnyis yod pa la chos bzangs dang
T02D2539:142b-36: chos shes gnyis 'khrungs nas rgyal srid bzung nas yod
T02D2539:142b-37: pa la ; chos bzangs kyis 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid la skyo ba skyes nas /
T02D2539:142b-38: der sangs rgyas mngon 'phags thos nas /
T02D2539:142b-39: nu bo la 'dir shog dang byas pas byung nas /
T02D2539:142b-40: nu bo'o cag gnyis bros la chos la 'deng byas pas /
T02D2539:142b-41: nu bo btsun mo la chags nas 'gro ma nus /
T02D2539:143a-0: @143a * // chos bzangs kyis gser srang bye ba khyer nas mkhar las mchongs te /
T02D2539:143a-1: sangs rgyas mngon 'phags la phul nas rab tu byung
T02D2539:143a-2: lo bcu gnyis su chos nyan nas yul du phyin
T02D2539:143a-3: nas bu smad dang 'khor kun la mi rtag ba'i
T02D2539:143a-4: mtshan nyid bshad pas kun thar pa la bkod do
T02D2539:143a-5: // nu bo chos shes la mi sdug pa bsgom
T02D2539:143a-6: pa'i thabs bstan pas der yid byung nas rab tu
T02D2539:143a-7: // byung / der chos bzangs kyis 'gro ba kun
T02D2539:143a-8: la chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pas kun tshim
T02D2539:143a-9: par byas nas phyogs thams cad du chos kyi 'khor
T02D2539:143a-10: // byung / lo bskor ro // mthar mngon par sangs rgyas so //
T02D2539:143a-11: chos shes byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog tu
T02D2539:143a-12: gyur nas 'jam dpal la lo stong du chos kyi
T02D2539:143a-13: 'khor lo bskor nas sems can thams cad la chos
T02D2539:143a-15: rje btsun gyi phrin las kyi yon tan ni byams
T02D2539:143a-16: pa'i go cha nas 'jig rten 'dren zhes pas bstan
T02D2539:143a-17: te / 'di ni rje btsun mig ser na zhugs
T02D2539:143a-18: pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' zla mdzes bya
T02D2539:143a-20: yul de na bdud dang mu stegs mang po yod pa gdul ba'i phyir /
T02D2539:143a-21: rje btsun gyis rgyal por sprul nas spyod pa mdzad do //
T02D2539:143a-22: de yang btson khang ba mang po'i nang na sems can mig phyung ba dang /
T02D2539:143a-23: yan lag bcad pa mang po bcug / la la lcags thag la brgyus /
T02D2539:143a-24: mi la la bsad pa dang /
T02D2539:143a-25: rke bcad pa'i mgo mang po bcer ba mthong /
T02D2539:143a-27: la la 'o dod 'bod pa mang po thos nas /
T02D2539:143a-28: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' des rje btsun tshol
T02D2539:143a-29: du 'ongs pas mi la dris pas grong khyer na
T02D2539:143a-30: spyod pa mdzad zer nas de rnams mthong bas skrag
T02D2539:143a-32: nam mkha' nas mar lha'i bu rnams na re /
T02D2539:143a-33: skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag khyed //
T02D2539:143a-34: zab mo'i gdams ngag khyed 'dod na //
T02D2539:143a-35: rje btsun spyod pa mdzad pa yin ;
T02D2539:143a-36: / the tshom ma za gdams ngag zhus //
T02D2539:143a-37: zer nas nang du phyin tsam na rje btsun seng
T02D2539:143a-38: ge'i khri la bzhugs nas ral gri dang mda' gzhu
T02D2539:143a-39: dang po ti bsnams nas bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
T02D2539:143a-40: de'i tshe nyam nga ba'i 'jigs pa de tsho med nas /
T02D2539:143a-41: der chos zhus pas chos thams cad sgyu ma la
T02D2539:143b-0: @143b sogs par bstan pas bdud dang mu stegs la
T02D2539:143b-1: sogs pa bred nas thar pa la bkod do //
T02D2539:143b-2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thabs des 'gro ba 'dren pa'o //
T02D2539:143b-3: de lta bu rje btsun de mchod pa'i gnas bstod
T02D2539:143b-4: pa dang phyag dang rim gro dang bkur sti'i gnas
T02D2539:143b-6: 'jig rten gsum po rnam par gnon ni sngon gyi
T02D2539:143b-7: dus na lha tshangs pa chen po des khams gsum
T02D2539:143b-8: gyi sems can sprul tsam na kho'i sgo nga las
T02D2539:143b-9: byung bas na kun la dbang byed pa yod do
T02D2539:143b-10: // de'i dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir rje btsun gyis
T02D2539:143b-11: khams gsum du gom pa gcig gis brkyang nas mnan
T02D2539:143b-12: pa'i skus khams gsum dus gcig tu nam mkha'i khams
T02D2539:143b-13: gang bas mnan pas lha tshangs pa'i dregs pa zhi'o
T02D2539:143b-14: // // bram ze'i spyod pa mdzad pas gsum rig go //
T02D2539:143b-15: mngon shes drug rjes dran drug dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che'o //
T02D2539:143b-16: gong ma lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mdzad do //
T02D2539:143b-17: rtogs pa'i ye shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gnyis med thob bo //
T02D2539:143b-18: rang gzhan don gnyis rdzogs pas kun la phan pa dpe las 'das pa'o //
T02D2539:143b-19: shes dang shes bya dbyings dang ye shes gnyis ka'i bdag po mchog go //
T02D2539:143b-20: gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag nas don ston pa
T02D2539:143b-21: zhes pas sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das
T02D2539:143b-22: pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnam gzigs kyi bskal pa
T02D2539:143b-23: la sdig pa byed pa'i dge slong drug byung /
T02D2539:143b-30: khong tshos mi khyim lnga brgya log lta la bkod par dam bcas so //
T02D2539:143b-31: ma 'khod pa bsad par byas so //
T02D2539:143b-32: de chos rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi mi rtag pa /
T02D2539:143b-35: bdag med pa las log nas /
T02D2539:143b-37: yod pa kun la bstan no //
T02D2539:143b-38: sangs rgyas rnam gzigs kyi dge slong gzhan rnams kyis ;
T02D2539:143b-39: /'dus byas thams cad mi rtag la //
T02D2539:143b-40: chos kun la ni bdag med cing //
T02D2539:143b-41: bdag med ther zug med do zhes //
T02D2539:143b-42: 'dren pa rnams kyis mngon par bshad //
T02D2539:143b-43: byas shing sgor bsod snyoms byas pas /
T02D2539:144a-0: de'i khyim bdag bde ba bya ba'i chung @144a * //
T02D2539:144a-1: ma 'od 'phro can bya ba la bu mtshan dang ldan pa cig byung /
T02D2539:144a-2: btsas ma thag tu bdag lta ba log pa can du skyol zer nas /
T02D2539:144a-3: ma bred nas mngon shes can la bstan snyam pa la /
T02D2539:144a-4: ma gcig bstan mi dgos lta ba log pa 'di
T02D2539:144a-5: rnams lta ba ma log par bya snyam pa yin
T02D2539:144a-6: / rdzas dang yo byad kun sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul zer nas /
T02D2539:144a-7: de ltar byas nas sems can thams cad chos rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po bzhi la bkod do //
T02D2539:144a-8: dge slong drug po shi nas dmyal bar skyes so //
T02D2539:144a-9: dmyal ba de yang lus nya mgo tsam /
T02D2539:144a-10: lce dpag tshad tsam du gyur nas rmon dor lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo ba /
T02D2539:144a-11: lus de la mdung thung stong gis brdeg pa /
T02D2539:144a-12: kha na mar lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za bar gyur to //
T02D2539:144a-13: des na gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste /
T02D2539:144a-14: phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston /
T02D2539:144a-15: de ltar bstan nas kun thar pa la bkod pas 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog go //
T02D2539:144a-16: gong du bstan pa'i yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pas nges 'byung nas rnam dag dpal lo //
T02D2539:144a-17: de lta bu'i rje btsun 'jam dpal 'di dpal /
T02D2539:144a-18: gang zag ji lta bu'i lag tu 'ong zhe na /
T02D2539:144a-19: 'jig rten na skal ba bzang po'i lag tu 'ong ngo //
T02D2539:144a-20: 'di dang su phrad pa la dpal ldan 'dis 'byor pa kun ster bas na /
T02D2539:144a-21: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
T02D2539:144a-22: rje btsun ye shes sku can gyi yon tan bstan pa'o //
T02D2539:144a-23: // da ni ye shes sems dpa' drug po la
T02D2539:144a-24: ye shes lnga'i sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa ni
T02D2539:144a-25: / mchog sbyin la sogs pa me long lta bu'i sgo nas so //
T02D2539:144a-26: sangs rgyas chags pa la sogs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2539:144a-27: sangs rgyas 'dzum pa la sogs pas so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2539:144a-28: med pa las byung la sogs pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2539:144a-29: sgyu 'phrul dra ba la sogs pas bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod do //
T02D2539:144a-31: da ni phan yon gyi rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T02D2539:144a-32: rje btsun 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan brjod
T02D2539:144a-33: pas yon tan gzhung nas 'byung ba bzhin rigs kyi
T02D2539:144b-0: bu'am rigs kyi @144b bu mo rjes su 'jug pa
T02D2539:144b-2: rje btsun gyi phan yon gyi yon tan bstan pa'o /
T02D2539:144b-4: // / sngags kyi don ni gsum ste /
T02D2539:144b-8: rtsa ba'i sngags ni aom nas aa yis bstan no //
T02D2539:144b-9: don ni chos thams cad 'byung ba'i rang bzhin /
T02D2539:144b-10: rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin /
T02D2539:144b-11: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhis rgyas btab pa nas rtsa ba'o //
T02D2539:144b-12: dam bca' ba ni pra kri nas ya te'i bar te /
T02D2539:144b-13: lhun gyis grub pa'i chos thams cad yongs su dag pa /
T02D2539:144b-14: phung po la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs
T02D2539:144b-15: pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gang
T02D2539:144b-17: phreng sngags ni aa a'a nas rarbha aa:'i bar gyis
T02D2539:144b-18: bstan pa ni don dam par skye med kyi ye
T02D2539:144b-20: kun rdzob tu ngag gi dbang phyug la sogs pa sku'i rnam par bstan pa'o //
T02D2539:144b-21: sngags kyi yon tan bstan pa'o /
T02D2539:144b-23: // / de ltar rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi rang bzhin
T02D2539:144b-24: ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas
T02D2539:144b-25: bshad pa la / 'khor phyag na rdo rje la
T02D2539:144b-26: sogs pa dga' nas ston pa la dga' ba'i bstod
T02D2539:144b-27: bshad pa la / pa'o // sku gsung thugs dang
T02D2539:144b-28: yon tan phrin las dag / bdag don gzhan don
T02D2539:144b-30: 'khor rnams thar pa nyid la 'god mdzad pa'i //
T02D2539:144b-31: lha mi'i ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2539:144b-32: ces bstod nas legs pa'i yon tan brjod /
T02D2539:144b-33: thar pa 'dod pa bdag cag rnams la sogs go sla'o //
T02D2539:144b-34: zab ste sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul yin gyi
T02D2539:144b-35: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi ma yin no
T02D2539:144b-36: // 'gro don ni thugs rjes bzung ba'o //
T02D2539:144b-37: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'o //
T02D2539:144b-39: mtshan brjod rdo rje'i tshig 'di ni //
T02D2539:144b-40: dgrol bar nus pa ma yin kyang //
T02D2539:144b-41: bla ma'i gdams ngag rim pa yis //
T02D2539:144b-43: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i man ngag gi 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2539:144b-44: rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhon nu grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
